Well, I don't know why, but I got a virus from this version of minecraft. I love all the mods, the elevator, spc, planes and speedboat, but I managed to infect my computer with an ad.rotator and had to waste a couple of hours to scan all my files. Am I the only one that this sort of thing happened to?
you got a virus from this version or this torrent?
I think it was from Minecraft.jar, but yeah, from this torrent. And it's a shame, as I REALLY love these mods.

If I could've cleaned the infected files from the .jar, without having to delete the whole application, everything would've been roses. That would be awesome if you could release a clean version. Oh, and my antivirus was nod32 when it detected those ad.rotators.
Oh, and if you could throw some core mods in there, that would be awesome. Most important, SPC; I won't ask for planes, since I know that mod's a bitch to get it working.
